metadata.title: CVE-2017-13775 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: GraphicsMagick 1.3.26 has a denial of service issue in ReadJNXImage() incoders/jnx.c whereby large amounts of CPU and memory resources may beconsumed although the file itself does not support the requests.

criterions.comment: graphicsmagick: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
